mapper.insert: insert into publishers(pub_id, pub_name, mgr_name, phone) values(${pubId}, #{pubName}, #{mgrName}, #{phone})
mapper.select: select pub_id pubId, pub_name pubName, mgr_name mgrName, phone phone from publishers
select pub_id pubId, pub_name pubName, mgr_name mgrName, phone phone from publishers where pub_id like ${pubId}
select pub_id pubId, pub_name pubName, mgr_name mgrName, phone phone from publishers where pub_name like '%'|| #{value} || '%'
select pub_id pubId, pub_name pubName, mgr_name mgrName, phone phone from publishers where mgr_name like '%'|| #{value} || '%'
select pub_id pubId, pub_name pubName, mgr_name mgrName, phone phone from publishers where phone like '%'|| #{value} || '%'
